DOC.criteria: coarctation severe aortic arch hypoplasia ( distal aortic arch zscore < 2 ) coarctation aorta septal defect coarctation mild aortic arch hypoplasia ( distal aortic arch zscore > 2 ) complex congenital heart diseases include aortic arch hypoplasia ( e.g . transposition great artery , double oulet right ventricle , atrioventricular septal defect , Shone 's complex ) univentricular ductdependent heart defect aortic valve and/or mitral valve stenosis/hypoplasia ( aortic valve mitral valve zscore < 2.0 ) leave ventricular dysfunction ( left ventricle ejection fraction < 60 % ) congenital renal central nervous system anomaly relate infectious disease prematurity ( gestational age < 37 week )
